biotools.summary:
a database of genetic variants that affect RNA modifications, with implications for epitranscriptome pathogenesis.

RMDisease a database of genetic variants that affect RNA modifications, with implications for epitranscriptome pathogenesis.

Deciphering the biological impacts of millions of single nucleotide variants remains a major challenge.
